Contact Us
==========

**![IMG_5000](http://www.benbrook-tx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=8013)
Benbrook City Hall**

[911 Winscott Road, Benbrook, TX 76126](https://www.google.com/maps/place/911+Winscott+Rd,+Benbrook,+TX+76126/@32.6785816,-97.4541001,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x864e0d588bc01bb7:0xca5eea0b7589ed62!8m2!3d32.6785816!4d-97.4519114)
Hours: Monday-Friday, 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. (closed on weekends
and major holidays)
Phone: 817-249-3000
Email:
[info@benbrook-tx.gov](mailto:info@benbrook-tx-gov)

Animal Control: 817-249-1610
Benbrook Water Authority: 817-249-1250
Benbrook Public Library: 817-249-6632
Police non-emergency: 817-249-1610
Republic Waste Services:469-388-4064
Senior Citizen Center: 817-249-6300

### [City Staff Directory](http://www.benbrook-tx.gov/directory.aspx) [Report a Concern or Request Services](http://www.benbrook-tx.gov/requesttracker.aspx) [Report a Website Issue](mailto:info@benbrook-tx.gov)

*The Benbrook Water Authority and Benbrook Public Library are separate entities from the City of Benbrook*
.
